roleset.name: prosper, do well
roleset.note: FLOURISH-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls exist-47.1-1, gorge-39.6. (from flourish.01-v)

example.name: usual usage
example.text: Back when the Burgess fauna were flourishing, it seems, human evolutionary hopes hung on the survival of a little worm with a backbone called Pikaia.

example.name: with secondary attribute
example.text: John flourished as a grad student--no, really!
